Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 <h2>Instructions</h2>
00002 <p>
00003         Drop 3D IP Lookup Widget into ~/Library/Widgets (that's the Library folder located in your home folder, preferred) or /Library/Widgets.
00004         Activate Dashboard, drag the widget to your screen and enjoy!
00005 </p>
00006 
00007 <h3>Lookup</h3>
00008 <p>
00009         Enter an IP address or a host name in the search field and hit <strong>ENTER</strong>.
00010         3D IP Lookup Widget will then:
00011         <ol>
00012                 <li>Launch a <code>traceroute</code> to the given host name or IP address;</li>
00013                 <li>Query the 3D IP Lookup web service to obtain a KML file from a list of hosts;</li>
00014                 <li>Launch Google Earth to visualize the resulting KML file.</li>
00015         </ol>
00016         Please be patient as <code>traceroute</code> may take a <strong>very long time</strong> to run.
00017 </p>
